name: Freddy's Canyon Runner
description:
DISCLAMER - if you want the download to work you must have the official itch.io app

Select your favorite character and run as much as you can. Collect as many golds and take all the way down thru the amazing canyon. Jump over and roll through obstacles and be very careful with the guard, he is just behind you to catch you!

Features:

- Intuitive controls to run right or left, jump and slide.

- 20 different maps,

- 3D Freddy Bear and Security Guard

- Enjoyable background music and soundeffects

- Influential HD graphics

- Nice Background music,

- Fun for children,

- Completely Free,

- Use this game to keep your kids,

Also, you can find characters:

1- Freddy

2- Bonnie

3- Chica

4- Foxy

5- Balloon Boy

6- Puppet

You can also download our another freddy surprise egg games.

Music: RetroFuture Clean Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License

Disclaimer: Five Nights at Freddy's is a trademark of the Scott Cawthon which does not sponsor, authorize or endorse this app.
